full_summary:
================================

### EF245-241400: Renovation Work on the 6th Floor of Dominique-Ducharme Building

#### Official Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** WS4422380628-Doc4422397471

**Amendment Number:** 6

**Solicitation Number:** WS4422380628

**Publication Date:** January 31, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** March 14, 2024, 2 PM (EST)

**Amendment Date:** March 07, 2024

#### Project Details

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the renovation work on the 6th floor of the Dominique-Ducharme building. The work will be conducted in accordance with the plans and specifications.

**Project Description**
------------------------

The procurement is for commercial and office building renovation and repair services.

**Procurement Method**
----------------------

This procurement will be conducted through a Request for Proposal (RFP) using an open bidding process.

**Selection Criteria**
----------------------

Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Contract Details**
--------------------

* Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For more information, please contact:

* Fahad Zanoun, Contract Officer
* Email: <fahad.zanoun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
* Phone/ Fax: Not available

#### Availability of Documents

* The bid documents are available on the Ariba Discovery portal.

[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18669206?extsite=MTg2NjkyMDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18669206?extsite=MTg2NjkyMDZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) (.Fetch the link)

#### Submission Requirements

Please submit your proposal by the tender closing date and time.
